attributes.action: Recognise Kashmir as Nation-State, free of Pakistan, India and China
attributes.additional_details: This is not a debate about who "owns" Kashmir, rather to recognise Kashmir as a state in its own right.
attributes.background:
We call on the representatives of the British people to:
-Recognise Kashmir as a Nation-State
-Assist in the establishment of free, secular and democratic government
-Do everything in their power to stop and deter all violence and aggression against Kashmir by Pakistan, India and China
